thread.title: Coco Austin and Ice-T Receive a Pile of Presents During Lavish Baby Shower
thread.title_full: Coco Austin and Ice-T Receive a Pile of Presents During Lavish Baby Shower

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Coco Austin and Ice-T Receive a Pile of Presents During Lavish Baby Shower
text:
Comments The 36-year-old model and her rapper husband receive a pile of presents during a lavish baby shower which she calls 'pre-birthday party.' 
Coco Austin and her husband Ice-T held a baby shower which she called "pre-birthday party" for their first child which is due in December. The expectant wife took to Instagram on Friday, October 23 to share a picture and a video of the lavish celebration in honor of their upcoming baby girl, Chanel Nicole. The 36-year-old model posted a picture showing a pile of presents after the party. Their dog was adorably lying on the floor in the said picture. In a lengthy note alongside the picture, Coco thanked guests who attended the lavish event. "Thank you to everybody that came up to Chanel's pre-Birthday Party last night!!! The party was too short.. I wish I spent more time with you..I was just getting my groove on when party ended!" it read. "I didn't get a chance to open your gifts at the event but I got them home safely and actually opened everything up until 430 in the morning!!! Thx to @angelbabynaz @saywardpaxine @tteav4lifebaby for staying awake with me and organizing," Coco continued. "They are all amazing!! Such cool gifts for a little girl.. Ice and I are blessed to have such thoughtful friends." Foto kiriman Coco (@coco) pada Okt 23, 2015 pada 10:53 PDT Meanwhile, the video showed her and her rapper husband goofing around at the photobooth. While Ice-T held a toy gun, Coco held huge props resembling baby bottle and pacifier. The two appeared to be having fun at the photobooth. "Ice and I are goofballs! #photobooth #chanelnicolebabyshower Haha," read the caption. Video kiriman Coco (@coco) pada Okt 23, 2015 pada 1:07 PDT Their pal Sayward White also posted on the social media a picture showing Coco unwrapping the presents. "Baby Shower After Party! Baby Chanel, Ice, and @coco received so many thoughtful and creative gifts," read the caption. "After getting home, we opened them all! As you can see your girl is really 'helping.' I can't party like I used to." Foto kiriman Sayward White (@saywardpaxine) pada Okt 23, 2015 pada 7:18 PDT On the previous day, Coco sported a number of dresses that she might use for the celebration. "I'm just having fun.. Playing dress-up is such a girlie thing to do!" she wrote alongside a picture of her wearing black dress. Foto kiriman Coco (@coco) pada Okt 22, 2015 pada 11:44 PDT Foto kiriman Coco (@coco) pada Okt 22, 2015 pada 4:08 PDT
